text: Bonačić () – also occurring in the diaspora variant Bonacic – is a Croatian surname and may refer to: * Duje Bonačić (1929–2020), Croatian rower * John Bonacic (born 1942), American politician * Luka Bonačić (born 1955), Croatian football coach * Ozren Bonačić (born 1942), Croatian water polo player ==References== Category:Croatian-language surnames
title: Bonačić
